summary: TL*THE CONTACT OWNS A 2005 DODGE DURANGO.  SOON AFTER THE VEHICLE WAS PURCHASED AND FUEL WAS ADDED, IT WOULD SPEW GASOLINE BACK AT THE CONTACT AND THE VEHICLE.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER SEVERAL TIMES, BUT NO FAILURE WAS EVER FOUND.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO ANOTHER DEALER AND THEY REPLACED THE FUEL TANK BECAUSE THE INLET CHECK VALVE WAS STUCK.  THE FOLLOWING MONTH, THE CONTACT DISCOVERED NHTSA CAMPAIGN ID NUMBER 05V034000 (FUEL SYSTEM, GASOLINE:STORAGE:TANK ASSEMBLY:FILLER PIPE AND CAP); HOWEVER, THE DEALER STATED NO RECALLS WERE AVAILABLE.  THE CURRENT MILEAGE WAS 88,504 AND FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 44,000.
